value: a scene along the river Windrush, Bourton

on the Fosseway (the A429) about 25 km North of Cirencester.

Driving from Cirencester, just follow the A429 North, you'll pass signs saying you've entered the village. From the North, just follow the A429 South. Follow signs to the large car park at the edge of the village. There is a footpath from the car park to the main street.

Bourton is quite attractive as a family destination. The river Windrush flows through the village, next to the main street.
In the charming centre you'll find a lot of attractions, a.o.:

The Dragonfly Maze: between the car park en the Birdland
